PYRAMID.name: Pyramid at Giza
PYRAMID.desc: A towering, triangle-like thing is before you.

HALLWAY.name: Entrance hallway of the pyramid
HALLWAY.desc: a long dimly lit hallway inside the pyramid.

DESERT1.name: Desert
DESERT1.desc: An empty, hot desert that stretches for miles and miles on.

CITY.name: Bustling city
CITY.desc: A city full of people that seem happy and talkative.

BUMP.name: Pyramid wall
BUMP.desc: You bump your head on the outside of the pyramid

WATERING.name: Watering hole
WATERING.desc: A large oasis bursting with life, such as camels, vegetation, and people.

TREASURE_ROOM.name: Treasure Room
TREASURE_ROOM.desc: A large room lit by torches filled with unimaginable treasure protected by officers.

CAMEL_SHOP.name: Camel's Inc
CAMEL_SHOP.desc: A medium-sized building next to a camel pen. There is a board on top that reads Camel's Inc.

INDOOR_SHOP.name: Inside the camel shop
INDOOR_SHOP.desc: A beautiful decorated room with a desk in the back and camel riding materials on the walls. Behind the desk is a man with a big, white smile.

MARKET.name: Marketplace
MARKET.desc: A street lined with merchants on either side. Sales people are shouting out deals left and right to try to attract customers.

BLACK_MARKET.name: Black Market
BLACK_MARKET.desc: A strip of the market where not as many people seem to be around full of shady shops. The merchants are selling dangerous and weird items.

BANDITS_DEN.name: Bandit's Den
BANDITS_DEN.desc: A dark place full of broken down houses and mysterious people. Several windows shut as you enter this area.

DESERT2.name: Desert
DESERT2.desc: An empty, hot desert that stretches for miles and miles on. Forward the outskirts of a marketplace can be seen.
